response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for us both. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
